doc.field: Grover's Trip to California (Stanford University and History Institute)
Grover's Trip to California (Stanford University and History Institute)

Includes correspondence and memoranda dealing with Clare Boothe Luce's gifts to Stanford University and the Anne Clare Brokaw Memorial, pamphlets "Scholarship and Cataclysm: Teaching and Research in American History, 1939-1945" and "A New American History" by Edgar Eugene Robinson, and brochures from the Institute of American History of Stanford University. Correspondents include Ernest Born, Louis B. Lundborg, Mirko Paneyko, Alvin C. Eurich, Edgar E. Robinson, and Dinald B. Tresidder.
Series VI. Allen Grover Files >> Grover's Trip to California (Stanford University and History Institute)
